name: BASTARD TOWER
description:
-> PLAY THE JAM GAME   <- -> LATEST VERSION  <- If you love the game and want to support it play the latest version and try the latest updates! -CONTROLS- Q and R - Rotate Camera Space / Ctrl - Up/Down
F - Follow your unit

This is in the meantime, as the admins from the jam allows me to upload the hotfix in the Itch page.

This is the version that solves a collision bug that makes the game unplayable. The world has been absolutely dominated by stupid demonic creatures, now the last humans must fight them and survive their army of evil! Order your team and build a high tower to protect your humans from the demons. You are going to DIE in the end.. But hopefully the next group of survivors may finish the tower. +INFINITE TOWER HEIGHT! +AI MANAGEMENT CONTROL +INSANE TOWERING ACTION
